author: But You | SOTY ✨
text: Slept a couple of hours but didn't dream of But You huhu. Guess I wasn't streaming enough. I'm so disappointed with myself 😤

author: But You | SOTY ✨
text:
Good morning konicland! Another wonderful day to be alive and have the opportunity to stream #BUTYOU . Gonna get that 5M asap!

Do we have new tags or nah?

author: But You | SOTY ✨
text: That I do remember, coz I was working there and I had to discreetly give them a handful of ketchup and they were so thankful like -- https://t.co/Z5wXj7BW5W

author: But You | SOTY ✨
text: In 24 hours, I only got 5 hours of sleep haha but I love what I'm doing and it isn't everyday my boys come back with a banger. But I'll sleep now don't worry. Y'all take enough rest, too. We'll do better if we're feeling better.

text:

#BUTYOU
